title: NBA week 15 summary, week 16 predictions
summary: Not a terribly impressive week for the NBA algorithm. We went 31/53, equating to 58% accuracy. New predictions are up — lots of predicted upsets this week, including two tonight. As usual, I’ve found checking the dashboard to be a great way to gain insight into such picks. Details …
content:
Not a terribly impressive week for the NBA algorithm. We went 31/53, equating to 58% accuracy. New predictions are up — lots of predicted upsets this week, including two tonight. As usual, I’ve found checking the dashboard to be a great way to gain insight into such picks. Details of past week by point spread below.

Point spread # games Accuracy
< 5 10 40%
5-9 13 62%
10-14 14 64%
>14 16 63%
